description.value: This CodeSystem contains coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose

definition.value: Aadhaar is a 12 digit individual identification number issued by the Unique Identification Authority of India
It is a document that certifies a person's residential status in a particular state
It is a documentary proof of a person belonging to a specific caste, as categorized under the Indian Constitution

A student ID card can be used by students to prove their identity on a school campus and at local businesses which is athorized by Govt. recognized educational institutions with student photograph on it
An official document granting a person permission to own and use a gun, usually subject to various restrictions.
The Senior Citizen Card issued by the Social Welfare Department provides a recognized proof of age to elders with person photograph on it
Pensioners Card
This is issue to person who participate in the freedom struggle it is issued by Govt. with person photo on card
Passbook issued to kissan which having kissan's photo

A national identification number is used by the governments of many countries as a means of tracking their citizens, permanent residents, and temporary residents for the purposes of work, taxation, government benefits, health care, and other governmentally-related functions.
National Health Resource Repository (NHRR) ID

display.value: Pradhan Mantri Jan Aarogya Yojana (PMJAY) ID

definition.value: Ayushman Bharat National Health Protection Mission Id (AB-PMJAY ID) is also a parameter which enables identifying a beneficiary family. This search will only be available to find the family of a beneficiary who has already verified and PMJAY ID has been generated by the system.

display.value: Registry of Hospitals in Network of Insurance (ROHINI) ID

definition.value: ROHINI (Registry of Hospitals in Network of Insurance) is a registry of unique hospitals in the Health Insurers and Third Party Administrators (TPAs) network, in India
ABHA (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) Address is a unique identifier (self declared username) that enables you to share and access your health records digitally.
The Central Government Health Scheme (CGHS) gives a plastic card called the CGHS card to all beneficiaries. The card comes with a unique ID and a photo
An ECHS member who possesses a valid Smart Card can avail of treatment at any ECHS polyclinic any where in India.
Every name visible to the public is certified and authorized to practice medicine in the country.
A Ration Card number is a 10 digit unique numerical figure assigned to every Indian citizen who is the holder of it.

The Indian Voter ID Card is an identity document issued by the Election Commission of India to adult domiciles of India who have reached the age of 18, which primarily serves as an identity proof for Indian citizens while casting their ballot in the country's municipal, state, and national elections
Families that have BPL cards are the ones who are living below the poverty line as specified by the state government
Border ID card
Sri Lankan Refugees Identity Card
Tibetan Refugee Card
Any other number, code, or other identifier that may be assigned to an individual under a law made by parliament or any state legislature
a 14 digit number that will uniquely identify you as a participant in India's digital healthcare ecosystem

display.value: Health Practitioner ID issued by NDHM

definition.value: Health Practitioner ID issued by NDHM
Any other identifier as may be notified by NDHM from time to time

display.value: Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal

definition.value: Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal

display.value: Certificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)

definition.value: Certificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)

display.value: Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)

definition.value: Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)

display.value: Identifier(s) assigned by central/state or local Government authority

definition.value: Identifier(s) assigned by central/state or local Government authority

display.value: Defence Personnel - Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority

definition.value: Defence Personnel - Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority

display.value: Fresh Certificate carrying the identity and address of the person(s) concerned issued by the Lt. Colonel

definition.value: Fresh Certificate carrying the identity and address of the person(s) concerned issued by the Lt. Colonel.
